item.title: Welcome to the website wuwuwu
item.description:
So, i can use Latex like: $F(x) = \frac{7}{2}x_1 ^2 -6x_1 x_2 - x_2 ^2$

And also, I can center that thing. Sortof like: \begin{equation*} \nabla F(x) = \begin{bmatrix} \frac{\partial}{\partial x_1}F(x) \
\frac{\partial}{\partial x_2} F(x) \end{bmatrix} \end{equation*}

\begin{equation*} \nabla ^2 F(x) = \begin{bmatrix} \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_1 ^2}F(x) & \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_1 \partial x_2}F(x) \
\frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_2 x_1}F(x) & \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_2 ^2}F(x) \end{bmatrix} \end{equation*}

Another thing, is I can use pictures. For that to be a thing, we use this thing:
